main event: A witness observed a translucent object with abnormal magnetic properties descending rapidly and changing direction abruptly over Bandon, Oregon.
interesting points: The object was described as being 8 to 10 feet in diameter., Witness estimated the object's speed to be between 175 to 200 miles per hour., The object emitted a blue-white light from its bottom and appeared to hover before darting away., The witness felt the object resembled a giant man hovering in the sky with no visible means of propulsion., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes.
sighted object: a translucent object with abnormal properties
